name: Alan Grunt (jinxedbyte)
description:
Alan Grunt

A local coop 2-player game. Submission the GMTK Game Jam 2021. Theme: Joined together.

Goal

Collect the dino bones according to the "recipes" in the top left, put them onto the platform and turn the wheel to uplift and complete your delivery.

Controls

Left: W A S D + E

Right: Arrow Keys + Enter
